law.text:
As used in this chapter unless the context otherwise requires:
"Home" means the institution to be established and maintained in any county having a city of the first class, in conformity with the provisions of this chapter.
"Board" means the body created by KRS 201.020.
law.history: Amended 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 173, sec. 1, effective June 18, 1964. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 938b-18.
